com.simiacryptus.mindseye.layers.cudnn.conv

Class SimpleConvolutionLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simiacryptus.mindseye.lang.ReferenceCountingBase
      • com.simiacryptus.mindseye.lang.RegisteredObjectBase
        • com.simiacryptus.mindseye.lang.LayerBase
          • com.simiacryptus.mindseye.layers.cudnn.conv.SimpleConvolutionLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MultiPrecision<SimpleConvolutionLayer>, Layer, ReferenceCounting, Serializable

    public class SimpleConvolutionLayer
extends LayerBase
implements MultiPrecision<SimpleConvolutionLayer>
    This convolution layer only supports an equal number of input and output bands. It is used as the foundational component for ConvolutionLayer, since the CudaSystem api has this restriction (in recent versions).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
